title: New: JUMANJI – Ark of Life
content:
Which is your favourite scene from Jumanji? I love when the kid turns into a werewolf, and Robin Williams doesn’t seem remotely fussed by it, and who can forget the animals stampeding through a plush suburban household? New York’s JUMANJI may have the name, but aside from that, bare little resemble to the 1995 classic, yet they’re still just as awesome.

Ark Of Life is a wonderfully lo-fi number, appearing lackluster on first listen, however flourishing on repeated hearings. A drum machine keeps a steady pace whilst reverb drowned guitars are plucked languidly over the top, which when combined with the drawled vocals makes for a thoroughly compelling listen. ‘Because I’ll probably die before I’m 25, I’ll never fall in love I’ll never get to be your bride’ bemoans the lead singer in a remorseful albeit slightly sarcastic manner. They may not be quite as extravagant nor as starstudded as the film, but with Ark of Life JUMANJI have rolled the die and it’s Yahtzee’s all round.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
